Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text:
This place is a real gem away from the tourist crowds. Cosy and lovely decorated. We were very kindly welcoming.
The burgers and the sweet potatoes fries were excellent. Everything was freshly ‚Ä¶

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: The burger was really good but fries were not crunchy.. Beer was good also..

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text:
Best burger in town.
Best meat, cooked to a perfect medium. Amazing bacon, picles and burger assembly. The fries are the best too. ‚Ä¶

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: I have found the best burger joint in town!! To cut a long review short, want burgers in Amsterdam, then this is your place to try!!  (Perhaps all the delivery service providers waiting outside should also let you know how great this place ‚Ä¶

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Amazing! The best burger we have ever eaten. Such a cosy place full of good energy and friendly owners who obviously care a great deal about the quality of the food they serve.

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: The best Burger‚Äôs we ever had. Also the vegetarian one was really tasty

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Excellent burger restaurant with a good choice of options and friendly staff

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: This is by far the best burger I've had so far in Amsterdam! Everything is so nice: the staff, the place, the drinks, and most of all the food. I asked for medium rare and I got just that. Perfect. My girlfriend likes her meat really cooked ‚Ä¶

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: The burgers and the sweet potatoes fries were excellent.

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: The restaurant is located in a main Street in Amsterdam, the staff welcomed us and was very polite. They respected the fact that we didn't speak Dutch and were very helpful. The drinks were great, especially the Oreo milkshake! ‚Ä¶

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Usually their burgers are good. I decided to go for a crispy chicken burger and it turned out to be dry and underseasoned.

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Excellent food and service!! The classic burger and cheeseburger were very good and worth every penny. Pair that with a milkshake and fries... pure heaven. Highly recommend. Service was outstanding with friendly staff. We felt welcome and the staff was attentive to our needs. Gracias!

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: The best burger in Amsterdam I've tried. Nice variety of toping allows you to customise you dish. Cozy atmosphere and friendly people, also it's not overcrowded during the day time on weekend, so you can go without reservation.

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Great burgers. The fries portions are huge, so you don't need to order one each!

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Ordered online. Best burger in town! Very tasty and the biggest amount of meat. You taste the happiness üòá

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text:
We didn‚Äôt know of this place and found it via Google - glad we did!

I ordered the cheese burger with smoked chorizo and a banana milkshake. We had ‚Ä¶

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Food was great service was better good meal good people great vibe

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text:
Very tasty and juicy burger. Long time since I didn't eat such an hamburger.
Variegated choice so I will definitely go again and try more.

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Top class burgers, beers and shakes. Great service.

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: One of the best burgers I‚Äôve had in my life, I ordered the Mr Mullard Burger and the sweet potatoes, and enjoyed every single bite. The staff is also nice. It‚Äôs a bit pricey and you might wait for a while, but definitely worth it.

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Sometimes just taking away these tastiest burgers makes my entire week better üòÇ.. Oh.. and the sweet potato fries‚Ä¶ üíñ  Just amazing. Small tip: call the restaurant and order directly - you get the discount

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text:
Loved the place.
Get a milkshake and sweet potato fries with your Burger to round the experience off. ‚Ä¶

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Way above average, very juicy and tasty choices! Had nachos and beers with it, very round burger experience. Atmosphere also great. In general very happy!

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text:
Very poor food. Nachos without any onion, lime, salsa or tomato?? Nacho chips were Santa Maria from
the store. Veggie burger and chips in the bin. Didn‚Äôt even attempt to eat it. Burger straight from wholesale or Albert Heijn. Waste of money

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Nice stuff and big choice of burgers, I really like one with pulled pork!

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Very nice place, friendly staff and in my personal opinion the burger I had was godlike. Loved it. Definetly gonna go again!

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: The burgers are super tasty, fries and deserts also worth trying. Love the friendly and quick service.

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Perfect burger, perfect fries and exceptional service!

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Nice spot, good burgers and lots of options. Not cheap but not too pricey... If your around worth a visit

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text:
Lovely little restaurant!
We sat directly at the window and could observe the busy streetlife.
Our burgers were very delicicous. ‚Ä¶

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Nice place, sometimes I have to wait a long of time, but I can say only one.. It's worth this time! Amazing Burgers, always fresh and very tasty. See you soon Happy People! üòÅüòä

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: the place and the burger was really nice. bit salty, but nothing a sip of beer coudn't fix. we had no reservation, there were still some seats free during our visit.

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Pluses: The most delicious burger I've had in Europe so far. Very tasty, non-crumbling bun and nicely-spiced and VERY tall patty. Friendly and accommodating service. ‚Ä¶

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Great cozy restaurant with nice outside seating. Staff is very friendly, happy to help. And the burgers are amazing too. Insanely tasty meat! You can also add ingredients to your liking. We even got free fries eventhough we didn't order one.

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Best Burger I ever had!

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Well first of all the staff here were super friendly. At this restaurant shared Nacho's as a starter and for my main I had the goat cheese burger. Everything was cooked and served to perfection. I also had their homemade iced tea. This was ‚Ä¶

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text:
Quiet little restaurant with lots of charming Interieur in Amsterdam. Very friendly and young staff.
One of the best burgers i ate! ‚Ä¶

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: First time visit but was very impressed. Nice simple decor with a range of high, standard and counter seating. Very friendly staff. Lots of different burgers including vegetarian us various sides. The shakes are very good and made with ice cream. Huge tasty burgers as you prefer. Can't wait to come back.

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: We each had a burger and a milkshake, their specialties and some fries to share. The burgers were really, really good, something we actually talked about a long time after going there. The milkshakes also were amazing. On top of that the service was excellent. Easy 5/5 :)

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Fantastic burgers! Definitely one of the best in town. I will surely come back

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Glad we walked into this place! Amazing burgers, really nice staff and great atmosphere! They even have a lactose free milkshake option!üòç So far best burger joint I've been to in Europe!

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Absolute favorite take-out place for burgers!! The BEST!! We‚Äôve been ordering there for years and cannot praise them enough. I always get the crispy chicken burger with sweet potato fries and hubby loves the pulled pork burger! Can‚Äôt go wrong with their menu!

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Great burgers and milkshakes in a very cozy environment. Fully recommendable. Different options for all types of tastes. Chicken, and beef-based menu mainly. If you‚Äôre looking for something vegan, this is not your place to go though. (Like the picture? ask for California and add chorizo :))

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Great burgers, even better chips!

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Absolutely delicious burgers. 10/10 would recommend. I would even go so far to say they were the best I‚Äôve ever had. Waitress had very good English which was very helpful and most things were translated on the menu.

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Everything about this place was phenomenal. The burgers tasted fantastic, just like the side dishes and at the end the milkshake. The whole evening was accompanied by very cool music.

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: The burgers were tasty but we found it a bit overpriced. The service was also a bit disappointing.

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Very good Burgers Shakes were very sweet but delicious

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: The food was amazing. The nachos were a good generous portion and filling. Burgers were incredible and had chips to share. We were absolutely stuffed.

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Was recommended this resturant after seeing high reviews of this place. We arrived an hour earlier than our reservation was booked for. They were very accommodating and seated us. Order was taken very swiftly. Food was roughly 30mins wait ‚Ä¶

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: I‚Äôve eaten these burgers many times and loved them BUT recently realized that they changed the burger buns ‚Äî WHY? The brioche buns were SO GOOD, now the bread looks like the one you buy in a standard supermarket‚Ä¶ quite disapponting‚Ä¶ please bring the old buns back! üôèüèª

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Very kind people workin' here. The beef was juicy and their own home made burger souce was very tasty too. My husband and I can really recommend this place. :)

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Nice atmosphere, very authentic. Burgers are nicely cook. BBQ sauce might be too sweet for some taste (like ours) but the place is a recommended one if you like burgers

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Very tasty burgers, sweet potato fries, good selection of beers and even a few more rare onee on draft.

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Just a little pricey for a hamburger. The food was delicious and the milkshakes make it worth it!

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text:
The burgers are amazing! Love the entrance of Nachos and the milkshakes. Super recommended.
I loved the California Burger and the classic Nachos!!!
Best burger in town!

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text:
Great Burgers, especially the goat cheese one

Fries are good aswell

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: No doubt the best burgers I've had in Amsterdam - the meat is delicious, the bun is great and they actually ask you how you'd like the meat cooked!! 1000% recommended. The take-away boxes are also recyclable, thank you for that :)

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text:
Super delicious burgers and very friendly waiters. I've been there two times, no problem to get a table.
I will go there again for sure.

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Amazing burgers...... So juicy and tasty! Would highly recommend this little hideaway

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Horrific service! Your employees are incompetent and it's a shame because I've enjoyed your burgers in the past. You've lost a good customer and we will never return or order from your place again.

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Best burger in Amsterdam and super friendly staff

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: I am a huge burger lover and I have to say... this was possibly the best burger I have ever had! The flavours of the beef were incredible and to make things even better, the chips were just as good! Highly recommend this place if you visit Amsterdam!

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Best burger in town so far, big, varied, and everything from patty to bun to sauce is delicious. Great sides and starters too

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Very nice place. Good menu, nice people here. Would recommend.

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Best choice of where to eat during our stay in Amsterdam. Pleasant greeting and immediately seated with menu's. Polite and friendly service. We didnt have to wait long for food. The burgers are out of this world, the best we have ever ‚Ä¶

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Small place but amazing burgers! Cozy environment with some special beers!

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: The best burger so far! Really amazing taste! Try it!!

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text:
THE BEST BURGERS IN AMSTERDAM!
great beef - amazing excellent variations - I have searched the best burger and this is it! Consistently juicy and flavorful ‚Ä¶

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Great place. Probably the best burger i ever ate. Good milkshakes.

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Perfect hamburger, excellent service. I recommend

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Very good burguers and excellent fries! Homecook style! Great for family nightout or gather with friends to eat. Is pet friendly also!

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: I love it. This is the place for a very nice burger in Amsterdam. Very informal and friendly atmosphere, the staff is very nice and caring. And the burgers are super super good: the bread is soft and full of flavour, the meat juicy and high quality. Definitely recommended!

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Very good burgers. Tasty and best quality ingredients.  A little bit pricey but trust me it's worth to try and worth your money to spend. Nice workers, nice place to sit and relax. Cozy restaurant design, concept definitely thought through. Keep up the good work guys.

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Great option for a burger. I got there a bit late and even though they were about to close they still served me very well and my burger was excellent. The place is really good and looks very nice, you can tell the owners put some real ‚Ä¶

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Excellent burgers. Excellent burger sauces. Delicious milkshakes. Friendly staff. This was probably the best place we ate out on our trip to Amsterdam. What made it so great was that we were struggling to decide between the cookie monster ‚Ä¶

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: I was amost giving up looking for a good burger in Amsterdam then I tried here and I no longer need to look for. This is it, hands down the best burger in the city.

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text:
Amazing burgers! Great milkshakes and very decent prices! A shirt tram ride from the centre streets, but the tram stop is super close to the restaurant.
They do offer alcohol now, I didn't expect that from some previous reviews ‚Ä¶

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Really good burger selection. I ordered the spicy burger and it was amazing. I definitely recommend coming to this place. The prices are also very affordable and the staff is genuinely nice. They have free WiFi as well.

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Superb food and price! :) I had a goat cheese burger and homemade fries. The burger was... wow, just out of the world. It was the first time for me to have melted goat cheese and balsamic dressing on my burger, so I can't even place it in ‚Ä¶

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text:
Friendly staff, excellent food, great location, perfect music - what more could one ask for. Definitely one of the best burgers I've enjoyed and I'll be back if I manage to get to Amsterdam anytime soon again.
So very enjoyable - give it a try.

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: We sat at the table outside and ate nachos, chicken tenders, a guacamole burger and a milkshake. There was nothing *wrong* with any part of the meal, but it was overall a bit lackluster. The nachos in particular left something to be ‚Ä¶

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Two years ago I gave 2 stars, now I am changing to 4 stars . Their change made me enjoy the food establishment much more than before. They made a big improvement and I think thats also something to appreciate them for. ‚Ä¶

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Wow. Highest rated burger joint in Amsterdam. Def worth the visit and the rating. Good delicious burgers. ‚Ä¶

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Apparently this was a good trip for food, because this was the best burger I can remember eating in a long time. ‚Ä¶

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Great service and amazing burgers. Try the nacho appetizer!

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: The Happy Bull is the proof that you don't need to go out of your way to be a good burger joint. A good patty, fresh ingredients and a premium bun are the simple ingredients to a delicious burger. Cosy seating with the warm atmosphere of ‚Ä¶

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text:
Incredibly nice! Great selection of burgers, no nonsense ingredients, just simple and perfect.
Best burger I've had in a long time. ‚Ä¶

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text:
Great tasting burgers and a lot to choose from, besides that you can choose different toppings to add like a Subway sandwich!!
Don't agree with the ice tea from previous comment, the homemade one is great, ‚Ä¶

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Very good burgers, good service. Quite crowded on a Saturday evening, which might be a little downside in Corona times, but that is not their fault. Recommendation!

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Awesome food and i loved the smal backyard. If you have time to go there do so :)

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: The best burger in the world üòÅüôÇ the best in my life üí™

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Tiny but cozy, very friendly and informative staff, very good burgers. Tried the Hottie burger with Jalapenos. Tasty and filling. Had the onion rings instead of fries, but will opt for the fries next time. Interesting after taste of the ‚Ä¶

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Seems like a super clean, wholesome nice place for kids and burger fans.  Really really good food, high quality ingredients.  Great burgers and some of the best chicken tenders in Amsterdam.  They also accommodated our huge group at short notice and even put hats and drawing material on the table for the kids which was really sweet.

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: I don't understand how someone described this place as having the most amazing burgers in whole Europe. I ate something that looked good and tasted like nothing at all. It had no taste, no salt, no nothing. The waiter was very pushy with ‚Ä¶

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Nice, friendly and helpful staff. Amazing food. Czech beer on draft (Budvar). What else could I ask?

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text:
Really amazing burgers! But don't get the mixed (homemade) iced tea!
Ambience was okay. Nice staff. Would definitely recommend it.

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Really comfy and original place, all the burgers are amazingüòåüòå

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Having eaten a Happy Bull burger 3 different times now I think I am able to write an informed review. Each time the burgers have been cooked to my liking, juicy and tasty, the steamy sauce is great and I thoroughly enjoyed each time. The staff are very friendly, I recommend Happy Bull to all diners.

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Thoroughly enjoyed the meal and shake. Loved that this is a restaurant that asks how you want your burger cooked as this is very rare to find especially in the UK. Great portion sizes and didn't feel bloated like after some burgers

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: literally one of the best burgers I have ever had. tasty, just the right size and cooked to perfection. I highly recommend the coleslaw aswell. a great little gem

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Burgers (meat from Ireland) are cooked to perfection. Great topping choices. High quality bun. Lots of Bev's. If you're looking for a American style burger, this is a great choice.

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Overall a great experience, the workers felt honestly kind, had a bacon burger, burger was great. The burger meat was buttery yet crunchy. Whole burger felt fresh, like homemade but ofc i couldnt make a such great burger myself.

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: The best burger I've ever eaten. The staff are so cool and friendly. I love this place

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: The burgers and shakes are delicious and the service is excellent. If the burgers came with fries included I would have given it 5 stars. But if you don't mind the price I would highly recommend.

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text:
Very friendly staff, and a great place to eat. The burgers are delicious, and there are lots of options for those who are gluten free! The GF onion rings in particular were a highlight.
I enjoyed eating here very much.

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text:
I had a really bad stomach after having the burger and the milkshake. We were there on Saturday night with really high expectations. I did not find the burger that good and also it caused me a lot of stomach problems after.
Hence the 1 star.

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Really warm atmosphere and delicious burgers. Really like it!

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: A nice cosy  place outside the centrum ring of Amsterdam.  What a delicious, tasty burger!. I got the Villy Burger,  a mix chorizo, mango, tropical tastes with a great Cabernet Sauvignon wine. ( Not only shakes here ;) ). I also recommend the sweet potatoes in place of the normal ones.

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: This is the kind of hamburger that will cause cravings afterwards, delicious meat, perfect buns, and the side dishes are equally good (crispy & fresh coleslaw, really nice fries). Waiters are friendly.

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Best burger I have had in a long time. High quality ingredients, cooked perfectly. Recommend the Texas BBQ burger!

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: One of our favorite burger places in Amsterdam. Great quality burgers and creative combinations such as the Texas burger with BBQ sauce and fried onions. For those not looking for a burger, the chicken tenders (starter or on the chicken burger) are great as well.

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Decent burger. Great atmosphere. Decent portion sizes. Fries were nice and salty. Milkshake was creamy. Fried chicken was LUSH. Burgers were tasty.

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Cozy place with absolutely delicious hamburgers that will not disappoint in the slightest. Amazing milkshakes and friendly staff. Will gladly visit again!

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: The food taste and look amazing ,for all the meat lover out there it's your destination

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Just moved to the hood and This is definitely  one of the best burger spots in amsterdam / good fries and milk shakes as well / but the part that sucks is this women, maybe the owner is so so rude every time we go in there / it has stopped ‚Ä¶

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Best burger in Amsterdam

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: The best burger I had in the Netherlands thusfar. I ordered the Texan burger, which was juicy, cooked to perfection (medium rare) with really tasty crispy bacon. Definitely recommend to any and all!

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Absolutely amazing! Polite service. Me and my partner couldn't decided between two milkshakes, so the server combined them into one so we didnt miss out. Would go again. Little bit expensive but so worth it

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Pulled pork burger is amazing!!

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Burgers is ok, not salty enough for my taste.

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: If you are in amsterdam you cannot miss out on this place. It's very easy to get to (right on the 2), and the food is amazing at a great price. The milkshakes are by far the best I've ever had. It's always busy but I've never had to wait ‚Ä¶

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Enormous, tasteful burguers! The place is rather small so make sure to book if you come with a larger group. I've visited when the place was still farily new, and they were still working out the licenses to sell alcohol. But they do serve a pretty nice lemonade!

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Great burgers, great fries, low key place, good music. Excellent beer list, which I didn't sample because I had enough already. üòâ

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Burger enthusiast from the states now living in Amsterdam....tried tons of burgers all over the region and Happy Bull without a doubt the best place for a classic burger in Amsterdam. Of the hundreds of "best burgers" that I have tried spanning accross the entire United States the Happy Bull ranks in my top 5

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Delicius Burger and great Beer. My favorite place now.

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Very small restaurant, however the food and service is outstanding!. You may make the mistake of walking past this establishment thinking it isnt worthy of a visit. However it really really is well worth a visit. I will go again if I return to Amsterdam.

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Cravings alert! The burgers here are so great, I'm scared of getting addicted. Forget about counting calories when you come here, and just enjoy the superb burgers. The Texas Burger is amazing.

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Please bring back those delicious brioche burger buns, those are key for your best burgers in town!

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: The atmosphere was relaxed and the staff was very friendly. The food was presented beautifully and that first bite you can taste the meat is fresh and seasoned perfectly. The owner asked about our experience and was very personable. I highly recommend it.

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: The finest Irish beef burger you will eat anywhere,including Ireland...im working here at the minute,but if visiting Amsterdam worth the taxi fare to sample for yourself...also milkshakes are fantastic,

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Best burger, great service, lovely place. Small restaurant but 100% worth a visit

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Great burger, fantastic taste. Loved it. The fries and onion rings where also very good

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Burgers and shakes is what it's all about, that's what we had and it was great.

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Went here and had simply the best burgers we've ever had, would recommend totally

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Very nice burgers for a reasonable price. Don't believe the fries are homemade, that could be an improvement. They offer kids menus too.

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Probably the best burger I've had in Amsterdam. Good selection of classic and creative burgers, good milkshakes, nice selection of craft beers from the US and the Netherlands

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Very good burger joint in our neighbourhood. Good burgers and they have non burger options too. I recommend this place. And I will go back of course.

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: The best burger from Amsterdam üòç

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Delicious juicy burgers. Great fries. The staff was attentive and friendly. The atmosphere is chill and the decor is beautifully modern.

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Fantastic taste but a tad expensive.

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: For an expat, this is the closest to an American burger I‚Äôve found in the city & they make amazing chicken sandwiches and milkshakes as well!

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Nice place, small but cozy, friendly staff and food was great!

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Very friendly staff, spoke english very well. Hamburger beef was excellent but burgerroll was industrial as well mayonnase. Nice interior, samalla and homey. Middleprize.

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Great burgers, went 2 times. First time the burger was a little better. I was there the second time at closing time, might be why.

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Incredible food, best burger I've ever had! Also, good selection of beers üëç

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Great services and great burgers! A wide variety of choice of burger as well.

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Very tasty burgers! Nice and cozy place. Would defo recommend!

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text:
I love their burgers and never missed out on the onions as side!
Small and cozy place with friendly and smiley staff

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Very good cheeseburger. One of the best I ever ate. I recommend it especially for Burger fanatics:)

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Excellent burger, very juicy succulent and tender patty and extremely soft and delicate bun.

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Great burgers and fries!  Delicious.!  Ate the Mr Mallard and it was incredibly tasty and juicy.

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Great food, great service, tiny bit expensive. I guess it's particular to the Netherlands or maybe Amsterdam alone but the service ends at like 9pm so be there early!

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Hamburgers were awesome and priced great. Must visit if you love burgers

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: One of the best burgers I've ever had. Great onion rings. Wonderful shakes.

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text:
Inside decoration reaaly nice! Amazing burgers, onion rings and fresh fries!
I highly recommand this place for burgers eaters! üò¨ üçî

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Definitely the best chicken burger I have ever had and the fried red onions and corn on the cob were absolutely delicious.

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: I am very dissaponted about this place.burger was not tasty but cold.additional IT is expensive because you need to pay for addinks like fries I do not recommend.

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Amazing burgers and milkshake.

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Their burgers were really impressive and delicious, fries were big and crunchy!

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Taste of home in Amsterdam. If you have picky kids with you that will only eat American food..this us your place! Staff are wonderful!

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Went here on the final night of our stay in Amsterdam. Very cosy and the food was lovely. Make sure you reserve a table if you have a party of three or more.

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: A great little restaurant! Burger was fantastic, fries were really good, and the service was terrific!

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Best burger I've had I'm Amsterdam!! This is my new go to place, they also deliver!!

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Awesome food in an awesome atmosphere.

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Best burger ever. Period. Proper review left on trip advisor

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Perhaps the best burgers I've ever had! The nachos are also fantastic.

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: The bread buns taste pretty cheap. The burger itself tasted good, but the quality of the buns was a bit disappointing

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Great food, great service and great place. I went twice the week I was in Amsterdam. Fridays and weekends are usually busy so make a reservation!

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Went here on a Sunday with a group.  Lots of choice for burgers,  good and friendly service

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: My burger was pretty good, as was the shake. People I was with didn't enjoy theirs that much.

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: One of the best burger places in Amsterdam... Lots of burger variety and nice little place!

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Very tasty burgers. We enjoyed them!

Name: The Happy Bull
Review Text: Great burgers and Nice milkshakes and very friendly staff

Name: The Happy Bull
